verses.text: Mamin Jehová, anhej t'ayach tzin col in b'a. Malajokab' b'ak'uinh tzin a cha somchajeli. Colinel yuj a tojolal.
Ak'cot tz'eyan a chiquin t'ayin, tzin a colan t'a elanhchamel. Ochanh in nhak'eenoc b'aj ol in col in b'a.
Yujto in nhak'een ach, in cuartel ach, yuj chi' ochanh wenhuloc. Ik' in b'eyoc yic manh ol ach alchaj chukal.
Colin t'a jun yaal ix em t'a wichanh, yujto in Kolumal ach.
Mamin Jehová, ach in Diosal, swak'kanoch in b'ha t'a yol a k'ab'. Ha ach tzin a colcaneli, to tz'elk'och syal a lolonel.
Tzin chaquel heb' anima syak'em sb'ha t'a juntzanh comon Dios malaj yelk'ochi. Ha inxo Mamin Jehová, tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Tzin tzalaj wal yuj a wach'k'olal. Ha ach ix ik'el in cusk'olal, ojtak pax in yaelal.
Maj in ak'kanoch t'a yol sk'ab' heb' wajk'ool. Te lewan b'aj ix in kan uuj.
Mamin Jehová, ok'okab' wal a k'ool t'ayin, yujto ay in och t'a ilk'olal. Ix te chacb'i in sat woq'ui, manhxalaj yip in pixan yet' in niwanil.
Ha in k 'inal slajwiem t'a skal in yaelal. Ha wab'ilal slajwiel yuj in k'acwi. Ha cusk'olal tz'ik'anel wip, k'ununi yel yip in niwanil tik swab'i.
Tzetzab'il in yuj heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, b'uchb'il in yuj heb' kajan t'a in lak'anil. Yajb'il in canel yuj heb' ojtannac in. Ha heb' tzin ilan t'a yoltac b'e, tz'el heb' t'ayin.
Junelnhej ix in b'atkan satk'olal yuj heb'. Icha wal to manhxo in animaoc swab'i, icha wal junok lum xalu pojnac, icha chi' waji.
Swab' sajson heb' wetchonhab' t'a in patic. Yalxonhej b'ajtiil, ay xivk'olal sja t'ayin. Junlajanxonhej snaan heb' t'a in patic. Nanon yek' sk'ool heb' tas syutej in yak'anchamoc.
Ha inxo jun Mamin Jehová, a achnhej ayachoch yipoc in k'ool. Toxonton swala': Ha ach wal tik, in Diosal ach, xin chi.
Yol wal a k'ab' ay in k 'inal. Colinel t'a heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, aton heb' tzak'anoch wuuj.
Il in wal och a in a chekab' in tik yuj swach'il a k'ool, tzin a colanel yuj a wach'k'olal.
Mamin, wan walan in b'a t'ayach. Manh in ak'b'at t'a niwac q'uixwelal. Ha heb' chuk tzak'kanb'at t'a niwac q'uixwelal chi', tzak'ankanb'at heb' b'aj tzinan, b'aj ay heb' chamnac.
Ha heb' snaank'e lolonel, numk'ajokab' heb', yujto syal lolonel heb' ya t'a heb' anima wach'. Spatiquejel heb' wach' spensar heb', sb'uchwaj heb' t'a heb' wach' chi'.
Yel ton wal niwan a wach'k'olal tzak' t'a heb' tzach ik'anchaanh. D'a yichanh heb' anima tzak' a wach'ilal t'a heb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool.
Ha t'a a tz'ey tza k'ub'ejel heb' t'a chukal sna heb' puch winak. Ha b'aj ay ach tza colel heb' t'a schukal lolonel heb' ajk'olal yajoch t'a heb'.
Alchajokab' wach' lolonel t'ayach Mamin Jehová, yujto satub'tac tas ix a b'o t'ayin yuj a wach'k'olal, ayic oyanoch heb' ajk'ool t'a in patic wichanh.
Ha wal yic manhxo animaoc in k'ool, ix in na' to ix in ik'kanel t'a ichanh, haxo wal yic ix in k'anan a colwal, ix ab' in tewi.
Xajanejec Jehová, masanil ex yiquexxo yujto ha' stanhwan heb' sk'anab'ajani, palta tz'akan syutej yak'an yaelal t'a yib'anh heb' syik'chaanh sb'a.
Tek'b'ejec he b'a mach ex tzeyak'och Jehová yipoc he k'ool.
